mapper.sql: SELECT mno FROM membertab WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, DECODE(gen, 'M', '남성', 'F', '여성') gen, birthdate, interest, describe, intershow, birthshow, genshow, isinflu, save_loc FROM membertab mt, profilepictab pt WHERE mt.mno = pt.mno AND mt.mno = ${mno}
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM poststab WHERE mno = ${mno} AND isshow = 'Y'

SELECT pt.pno, postcont, postdate pdate, linkno, (substr(bname, 1, 10) || '...') bname, writer, gname, smallimg, id, ischeck FROM poststab pt, liketab lt, booktab bt, membertab mt, genretab gt where pt.pno = lt.pno AND pt.bno = bt.bno AND bt.genre = gt.genre AND pt.mno = mt.mno AND pt.isshow = 'Y' AND mt.isshow = 'Y'
AND lt.mno = ${mno} AND lt.ischeck = 'Y'
AND pt.mno = ${mno}
ORDER BY postdate DESC
